text: variki purvam gadicina nuh jati varu mariyu vari pidapa vaccina itara vargala varu kuda (tama pravaktalanu) asatyavadulani tiraskarincaru. Mariyu prati samajam varu tama sandesaharunni nirbhandhincataniki prayatnalu cesaru. Mariyu asatyanto satyanni khandincataniki vaduladaru; kavuna civaraku nenu varini pattukunnanu. Cusara! Na siksa ela undindo
